dcterms:creator: A. Letcher
dcterms:description: A two-player game where each player's policy is a single scalar value, visualized in a two-dimensional plane. The game structure allows for coordination between players to achieve a preferred solution.
dcterms:title: Logistic Game

dcterms:creator: R. Axelrod
W. D. Hamilton
dcterms:description: A repeated game where two players must decide simultaneously whether to cooperate or defect, allowing for strategies that can retaliate against defection.
dcterms:title: Iterated Prisonerâ€™s Dilemma (IPD)

dcterms:creator: C. Lu
T. Willi
C. A. Schroeder De Witt
J. Foerster
dcterms:description: A game where two players choose between two actions, with the outcome depending on the combination of their choices. The game is characterized by its zero-sum nature.
dcterms:title: Iterated Matching Pennies (IMP)

dcterms:creator: W. H. Press
F. J. Dyson
dcterms:description: A game where two players must choose between two actions, with the potential for mutual cooperation or disaster depending on their choices.
dcterms:title: Chicken Game
